sections.general: staffing coordinator professional summary an energetic staffing professional seeking challenging experiences in talent acquisition and talent management. solid communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills. experience in working with upper management and executives to coordinate meetings, travel arrangements and onboarding of new employees. skill highlights event coordination microsoft word, excel, power training and experience in infovision ii, retail link, and spectra databases; used to analyze sales point, outlook, sharepoint numbers and performance, and create progressive goals for upcoming months. brassring and taleo candidate tracking systems
